failure_text.en:
We are sorry for the inconvienience but we could not retrieve role information from the Grid Configuration Database (GOCDB).


Choose whether to Abort or Continue accessing the service without role information from the GOCDB.

updated_aup_title.en:
We've updated our Acceptable Use Policy(ies).

Please find below the list with the updated Acceptable Use Policies.

You can click 'Continue' any time.

updated_aup_description.en: For more information click %HERE% to review all Acceptable Use Policies
